ruleset.name: Apex Naming Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex naming conventions

rule.name: VariablesMustNotShareNamesWithClasses
rule.message: Variable names must not share names with classes to avoid confusion and improve code clarity
rule.description: Variable names should not match class names to avoid confusion. When a variable shares a name with a class, it can be unclear whether the identifier refers to the class or an instance, making the code harder to read and understand.
